text: wajaealna bayn 'ahl "sba" -whm "balymn"- walquraa alati barakna fiha -why "alsham"- mudnana mtslt yura baeduha min bed, wajaealna alsayr fiha syrana mqddarana min manzil 'iilaa manzil la mshqt fyh, waqulna lhm: siruu fi tilk alquraa fi ay waqt shitum min layl 'aw nhar, aminin la takhafun edwwana, wala jweana wala etshana
